```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(readxl)
library(tidyverse)

data <- read_xlsx("pwt91 (1).xlsx") %>% 
  filter(country == "Thailand") %>% 
  select(year, pop, rgdpe, rgdpna, emp, avh, ccon, cn, ctfp, delta, cwtfp, csh_c) %>% 
  mutate(gdp_per_capita = rgdpe / pop)
```

```{r}
plot <- ggplot(data, aes(year, rgdpe)) + 
  geom_line() +
  scale_y_log10()


plot4 <- ggplot(data, aes(year, rgdpe)) +
  geom_line() +
  scale_y_continuous(limits = c(0, 1200000), breaks = seq(0, 1200000, by = 200000)) +
  scale_y_log10()
  #labs(title = "Thailands GDP over Time", 
   #    x = "Year", y = "Real GDP at Chained PPP (in mil. 2011 $US") + 
  #theme_classic() +
  #geom_vline(xintercept = 1997) +
  #geom_text(aes(x = 2012.5, label = "Asian Financial Crisis", y = 3.5), 
   #         color = "blue", angle = "90", size = 3)

plot2 <- ggplot(data, aes(year, cwtfp)) + 
  geom_line()

plot3 <- ggplot(data, aes(year, gdp_per_capita)) + geom_line() + scale_y_log10()


```
